settings.subtitle: Create an amazing FAQ page with a full-width banner

settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.subtitle: To bring glory to God by supporting our customers and their families, our employees, and our partners. To provide hope and positively impact everyone who comes in contact with Pink Stork.

settings.title: Pink Stork Customer Guarantee
settings.content: .Here at Pink Stork we stand behind our products.If any of our products don’t meet your standards, we will provide a full refund within 60 daysof purchase, even if it’s opened or used. We will also pay for the shipping!To initiate a return, just emailcustomerhappiness@pinkstork.comand provide proofofpurchase. We will send you return postage within 24 hours. No lengthy process, no need toexplain why. We provide simple, good old-fashioned customer service.You can purchase our products worry-free, knowing that they are backed by the best return policy in the business. We stand by our products, and we stand by you!

settings.title: OUR Mission
settings.sub_description: To bring glory to God by supporting our customers and their families, our employees, and our partners. To provide hope and positively impact everyone who comes in contact with Pink Stork.

settings.description:
If any of our products donâ€™t meet your standards, we will provide a full refund within 60 days of purchaseâ€‹, even if itâ€™s opened or used. 
We will also pay for the shipping!
To initiate a return, just email cs@pinkstork.com and provide proof of purchase.
We will send you return postage within 24 hoursâ€‹. No lengthy process, no need to explain why. We provide simple, good old-fashioned customer service.
You can purchase our products worry-free, knowing that they are backed by the best return policy in the business. We stand by our products, and we stand by you!

settings.text-area-info: Here at Pink Stork we stand behind our products.

settings.title: Why do we have a Rewards program?
settings.content:
At Pink Stork, we pride ourselves on our customer service. We strive to produce products from a consumer perspective and keep a commitment of constant improvement. Our Rewards program allows us to directly engage with you and learn how you truly feel about our products.

We are a growing company so this program is extremely important for our newly released products. The feedback provided by you will help to better gauge our market and where we may need to make improvements. Plus, we love your suggestions!

Pink Stork Rewards members should be supportive of other women as we are all on this journey together. Our story and our products are special to us and we want to make sure our members enjoy the company they are sharing their experiences with!

settings.description: Our Pink Stork Rewards members will receive first-release products, points for every purchase, and exclusive member rewards.
For every $1 you spend you get 10 Pink Points to redeem for things like free shipping and discount codes.
Pink Stork Rewards members get the first news about sales, new products, and deals exclusive to our website.

settings.title: What are the Responsibilities of a Pink Stork Rewards Member?
settings.content: Members are here to leave honest feedback on our products to inform other women about their experience. Pink Stork Rewards members support the women in the program as well as in their life! We are striving to build a community of women uplifting and empowering other women!

settings.title: Does the Pink Stork Rewards Program sound like fun?

settings.contact_subtitle:
We love to hear from our awesome customers. If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions we want to know! 
Please email us or submit the form below. We strive to respond to inquiries within 24 hours.
settings.title: Get in touch
settings.subtitle: Subheading
settings.phone-text:
1093 A1A Beach Blvd Suite 334
St. Augustine Beach Florida 32080

settings.sub_info: If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at
If you have a question or issues with this form, please email us at cs@pinkstork.com.

settings.title: There was something wrong with my package.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry about that. Unfortunately, shippers are not always the most careful with packages. We are happy to help!

Please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: I havenâ€™t received my package yet.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry about that. We understand how important it is to receive your products quickly and would love to make it right!

Please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: I didnâ€™t like the product.
settings.answer:
We want to make sure you have a good experience with your product! We stand by our products and our Happiness Guarantee.

Please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: My coupon code didnâ€™t work.
settings.answer:
We are so sorry about the inconvenience! We are happy to resolve this issue.

Please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: Where is my package?
settings.answer: You should have received an order confirmation email containing a tracking number that can be entered on the according carrier's website to check the status of your package. If it is still in pre-shipment or has been in transit for a few days, please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: My package is stuck in transit?
settings.answer: We use the following shipping methods: USPS, UPS, and FedEx to ship our products within the U.S. There can be unexpected delays during the shipping process. If your package is caught in transit, please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: Why didn't I get free shipping?
settings.answer:
We currently offer free two-day shipping on orders over $49.99 and standard shipping on orders under $49.99 that are being delivered in the U.S.

If there was a mistake with your shipping fee, please reach out to us at cs@pinkstork.com or via our Contact Us form and provide us with your order number so we can better assist you!

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Total Fertility contains vitamins, minerals, and herbal extracts to support a woman’s natural reproductive cycle - including Chaste Tree Berries, Ashwagandha, Folate, B Vitamins, Vitamin D, Zinc, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

When should I start taking Total Fertility?

We always recommend checking in with your healthcare provider. Most women start supplementing six months before trying to conceive, and you can start at any point in your cycle. We typically recommend starting our Total Fertility as soon as you receive it, and continue until you receive a positive pregnancy test.

Will this change my cycle?

Some women with regular cycles take our Fertility products and do not see changes. We always recommend talking with your doctor before starting anything new as they can advise you best.

Can men use Total Fertility?

While some men have used our Pink Stork Total Fertility, we now have our Blue Stork Fertility supplement for men!

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
Blue Stork Fertility supports male reproductive wellness with Zinc, Folate, L-Carnitine, B-Complex vitamins, Maca Root, Horny Goat Weed, and more. It takes two to make a baby, and ladies aren’t the only ones who need to prepare for conception! Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

When should I start taking Blue Stork Fertility?

Many men will start supplementing at least six months before trying to conceive. We suggest starting it straight away and continuing usage as long as you are trying to conceive.

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Strawberry Pomegranate Fertility Sweets contain Folate, Zinc, and vitamin B6 - essential vitamins for supporting women’s reproductive wellness. Fertility Sweets can also benefit men’s reproductive health while trying to conceive! Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I take these while pregnant as a prenatal vitamin since they have vitamins?

While our Fertility Sweets do not include every vitamin you need during pregnancy, many women will continue using our Fertility Sweets to get the extra vitamins they do contain.

Are Fertility Sweets Vegan?

Our Fertility Sweets are vegan, and they are made without GMOs, gluten, wheat, sweeteners, colors, animal products, shellfish, preservatives, fish, soy, tree nuts, peanuts, or dairy.

Can my boyfriend/husband use Fertility Sweets too?

Yes! Men can use our Fertility Sweets as well, as they can support male reproductive wellness.

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Fertility Tea helps support a woman’s natural reproductive cycle with seven USDA organic herbs, including Chaste Tree Berries, Red Raspberry Leaf, Lady’s Mantle, and Nettle. We currently offer two flavors - Mint and Sweet Mint.  Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What if I take Fertility Tea during my two week wait? Is it dangerous?

We always recommend checking in with your healthcare provider! We have many women that use our Fertility Tea before they test for pregnancy. We recommend switching to our prenatal line once pregnancy is confirmed!

When should I consume Fertility Tea?

We always recommend checking in with your healthcare provider. In general, we recommend consuming 1-3 cups daily throughout your entire cycle until you receive a positive pregnancy test.

Can I take Fertility Tea along with prescription fertility medication?

Because every woman and situation are different, we recommend talking with your doctor before consuming our Fertility Tea. They will be able to advise your usage based on your specific situation.

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
This bundle contains our fertility products for women: Fertility Tea, Total Fertility, and our yummy Fertility Sweets (which are great for your partner, too!). These products work together to support a woman’s natural reproductive cycle and are typically taken while trying to conceive. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Why should I buy the whole bundle?

Our products work together to help support your reproductive wellness. Many women enjoy using our fertility products together to support their healthy cycle - so we bundled them together to save you money as you’re supporting your health!

When should I consume Fertility Tea?

We always recommend checking in with your healthcare provider. In general, we recommend consuming 1-3 cups daily throughout your entire cycle until you receive a positive pregnancy test.

Can my boyfriend/husband use fertility sweets too?

Yes! Men can eat our Fertility Sweets as well, as they can support male reproductive wellness.

settings.title: Fertility
settings.answer:
Pink Stork’s Fertility Supplement Bundle is ideal for the couple who is working together to support their reproductive health! Pink Stork Total Fertility supports a woman’s natural reproductive cycle with Chaste Tree Berries, Ashwagandha, Folate, B Vitamins, Vitamin D, Zinc, and more. Blue Stork Fertility supports men with  Zinc, Folate, L-Carnitine, B-Complex vitamins, Maca Root, Horny Goat Weed, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Why should I buy the bundle?

Fertility health is a big deal for many couples! These supplements provide support to both of you with essential vitamins and nutrients. Many couples will start using the products before trying to conceive. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

When should I start taking Fertility?

Most couples start  supplementing six months before trying to conceive, and you can start at any point in your cycle. We typically recommend starting our Fertility as soon as you receive it, and continue until you receive a positive pregnancy test.

Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How are the two supplements different?

Great question! Blue Stork Fertility is a more focused supplement aimed at supporting overall male reproductive wellness. Pink Stork Total Fertility is a wide-spectrum supplement to support a woman’s natural cycle, and provide essential nutrients many women are looking for while trying to conceive.

settings.title: PMS
settings.answer:
Pink Stork PMS Tea helps support a healthy cycle, relieve discomfort, tone your uterus (aka ease cramps), and provide nutrients many women are missing. This warm cinnamon tea features USDA Organic Cinnamon, Chaste Tree Berries, Ginger, Red Raspberry Leaf, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I use this when I am not on my period?

Yes! Our PMS Tea is designed to be consumed throughout the month to support your body when your PMS symptoms arise.

This has chamomile, will it make me tired?

We use Chamomile in our PMS Tea to help relax your body, and you may prefer to drink it before bed! Feel free to check in with your healthcare provider if you have any concerns.

settings.title: PMS
settings.answer: Nobody likes PMS. Sweet Peppermint PMS Sweets are made with organic Peppermint and Vitamin B6 to support a healthy cycle and relieve discomfort associated with PMS. These sweet drops are individually wrapped and discreet, perfect to take on-the-go. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: PMS
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Total PMS contains B-Vitamins, Magnesium, Chaste Tree Berries, Dong Quai, and other herbs to support your body throughout your entire cycle. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How often should I take this?

You can take two Total PMS capsules every day for optimal results, or take two capsules as needed to treat your symptoms. We recommend reaching out to your doctor before starting any supplements.

Why is there so little magnesium if it helps with muscle cramps?

When taking too much magnesium orally, you may get stomach cramps. To avoid possible discomfort, we keep the levels low in Total PMS. If you're looking for additional magnesium, our Mist and Flakes provide transdermal supplementation.

If too much iron can lead to overdose why have such a high amount of iron in this?

Total PMS contains 100% of the FDA's daily recommended dosage of Iron. Many women are deficient in Iron, especially around their period.

settings.title: PMS
settings.answer:
Pink Stork PMS Bundle combines Total PMS, PMS Tea, and PMS Sweets to help support a healthy cycle and relieve discomfort associated with PMS and period symptoms. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How often should I use these products?

You can take two PMS support capsules every day for optimal results, or take two capsules as needed to treat your symptoms. You can also use our PMS Tea and Sweets at your discretion! We recommend reaching out to your doctor before starting any supplements.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Three things are widely recommended during pregnancy: a quality prenatal, DHA, and Folate. Pink Stork Total Prenatal has it all! Total Prenatal helps supply the essential vitamins your body needs during pregnancy in two capsules. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What type of folate do you use in the Total Prenatal?

We use a type of L-Methylfolate, called Quatrefolic. We believe it's the industry standard best form of Folate, and it's ideal for women with the MTHFR gene.

Can I open the capsule and pour the contents into water or a smoothie?

Some women will open our prenatal capsules and pour them into water or a smoothie to consume. However, we cannot guarantee you will be getting all of the same nutrients as swallowing the capsule whole. We encourage you to talk with your doctor about what would be best for your situation.

What is the source of DHA?

Our Total Prenatal uses Life’s DHA™, sourced from micro-algae. Micro-algae is a vegetarian and sustainable source of DHA.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Liquid Prenatal is a fast-acting liquid prenatal with whole-food organic ingredients: Folate from lemon peels, B-vitamins, Iron, and more. Our Liquid Prenatal is made without DHA for taste purposes. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

I left my Liquid Prenatal on the counter or in the car for a few hours. Is it still okay?

We encourage women to refrigerate our Liquid Prenatal and to keep it out of direct sunlight or extreme temperatures.

Is Liquid Prenatal Vegan?

Yes!

Is the bottle BPA free?

Yes!

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Liquid Folate is a great way to supplement folate and avoid another pill! Folate is widely recommended before and during pregnancy, as it’s essential for healthy fetal development, and supporting energy and stress levels.  Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Does the Pink Stork Liquid Folate have to be refrigerated?

While most women do enjoy our Liquid Folate refrigerated, you do not need to put it in the refrigerator after opening. Just make sure you keep it out of direct heat and sunlight!

How does the lemon peel provide Folate?

Folate is naturally found in the peel of a lemon. You can find more detailed information on our source at http://www.orgenfamily.com/orgen-fa.html. 

What amount of liquid is in each dropper?

Our Liquid Folate dosage is 1 ml, or 800 mcg, per dropper.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Pink Stork DHA is recommended during pregnancy to support your baby’s nervous system, brain, and eye development—and some women need to supplement after childbirth, too! One small soft gel contains 225 mg of Omega-3 Fatty Acids in one small soft gel. Wild-caught, non-GMO, low in mercury, and soy-free. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What is the source of DHA?

Our DHA comes from anchovies, which are naturally low in mercury.

Does this supplement fulfill the recommended daily dosage of DHA?

Pink Stork DHA has 225mg of DHA in it which is just below the FDA’s recommended daily supplementation of 300mg daily during pregnancy.

What type of gelatin is in the product?

The gelatin used in our DHA is a beef-based gelatin.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Premium Prenatal is a complete prenatal multivitamin and includes nutrients from organic whole food sources. This product provides support for your prenatal needs and includes blends for morning sickness, gut health, and baby’s development. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I open the capsule and pour the contents into water or a smoothie?

Some women will open our prenatal capsules and pour them into water or a smoothie to consume. However, we cannot guarantee you will be getting all of the same nutrients as swallowing the capsule whole. We encourage you to talk with your doctor about what would be best for your situation.

Does it contain Folate or Folic Acid?

Our Premium Prenatal contains Folate, not Folic Acid. Our Folate supplement uses a type of L-Methylfolate known as Quatrefolic. This is the active form of folate, ideal for women with the MTHFR gene.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Folate is widely recommended to support maternal and fetal health. Our Folate contains 5-MTHF, the type of Folate recommended for those with the MTHFR condition. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What type of Folate is used?

Our Folate supplement uses a type of L-Methylfolate known as Quatrefolic. This is the active form of folate, ideal for women with the MTHFR gene.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer:
Support your body through the end of pregnancy and postpartum with USDA Organic Red Raspberry, Nettle, Chamomile, and other herbs. Pink Stork Labor Prep Tea has a floral flavor and is available sweetened or unsweetened. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Does Labor Prep benefit moms who have C-sections?

Yes, our Labor Prep can help restore the nutrients lost during childbirth for moms who have had a C-section, and support your uterus as it tones back down to “normal” size.

When can I start drinking this?

We recommend consuming our Labor Prep Tea in your third trimester to support your body before childbirth and during recovery.

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer: Pink Stork’s improved Pregnancy Bundle with a 30 day supply of Pink Stork Total Prenatal + DHA, Pro, and Sleep Tea. Comprehensive prenatal nutrition, probiotics designed for pregnancy, and sleep support are beneficial throughout each trimester. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Prenatal
settings.answer: Pink Stork Premier Bundle features seven of our top pregnancy products. Enjoy Total Prenatal + DHA, Gut Health, Pro, Mist, Morning Sickness Sweets, Sleep Tea, and Labor Prep Tea for ultimate prenatal support. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Nursing
settings.answer:
Breastfeeding is hard work! Pink Stork True Milk provides lactation support with organic herbs (Galactagogues) that support breast milk supply and flow, including Fenugreek, Milk Thistle, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I take True Milk and Lactation Tea together?

Many women use our lactation products together - and we even have a Nursing Bundle that combines our top lactation products.

Can I take True Milk while pregnant?

We recommend starting our True Milk after childbirth. We just do not suggest using while pregnant as some galactagogues can cause early labor.

How quickly did you see results?

Many women who take our products see results within a few days. Every woman is different and will see different results.

settings.title: Nursing
settings.child-title: Pink Stork Lactation Herbal Mint Tea
settings.answer:
Breastfeeding can be challenging. Lactation Tea supports milk supply, milk flow, and more with known milk-supporting herbs called Galactagogues, including Blessed Thistle, Fenugreek, Marshmallow Root, Fennel, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Doesn’t spearmint decrease supply?

We use a small amount of spearmint for the great taste. Our formula was developed by an herbalist and nursing consultant, and the amount of spearmint that we use is unlikely to affect milk production.

Can I drink this while pregnant? We recommend starting our Lactation Tea after childbirth. We do not suggest using while pregnant as some galactagogues can cause early labor.

How often should I drink this?

We recommend drinking 1-3 cups daily based on your supply needs.

settings.title: Nursing
settings.child-title: Pink Stork Lactation Smooth Vanilla Tea
settings.answer:
Breastfeeding moms need extra support sometimes! Lactation Tea supports milk supply, milk flow, and more with proven milk-supporting herbs called Galactagogues, including Nettle, Fennel, Ginger, Anise, Fenugreek, Marshmallow Root, and Milk Thistle. Smooth Vanilla Lactation Tea is available in sweetened or unsweetened. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I drink this while pregnant?

We recommend starting our Lactation Tea after childbirth. We do not suggest using while pregnant as some galactagogues can cause early labor.

How often should I drink this?

We recommend drinking 1-3 cups daily based on your supply needs.

settings.title: Nursing
settings.answer:
Lactation Cookie Mix contains seven galactagogues (herbs to support breast milk production), USDA organic superfoods, and chocolate chips. Shatavari, Marshmallow Root, Milk Thistle, Blessed Thistle, Anise, Alfalfa, and Brewer’s Yeast support your breast milk supply, and help support natural energy levels! Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I use these with other lactation products?

Our Lactation products can be used interchangeably, so you can use them together or separately!

settings.title: Nursing
settings.answer: Pink Stork’s improved Nursing Bundle now includes True Milk, Smooth Vanilla Lactation Tea, and Lactation Cookie Mix. Breastfeeding is hard work, and some moms need a little extra support. Use these three products together or interchangeably to support breast milk production and flow. Not for use during pregnancy. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Nursing
settings.answer:
Pink Stork No Flow contains USDA organic Hibiscus, Sage, and Peppermint - which are widely-recommended herbs to naturally reduce breast milk.  Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I use No Flow while breastfeeding/pumping?

In general, nursing or pumping will signal your body to produce more milk and work against our No Flow Tea.

Why can’t I use No Flow while pregnant?

We do not recommend consuming our No Flow Tea while pregnant as some of the herbs are not considered safe for use during pregnancy. While they are great for helping to reduce milk flow when weaning, we like to err on the side of caution when it comes to pregnant mamas and their babies!

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer:
Specifically formulated for new moms, Pink Stork Total Postnatal provides Vitamin A, B-vitamins (including Folate), Vitamin D3, Vegetarian DHA, Iron, and more essential nutrients to support your enhanced needs. These vitamins are recommended for new moms, especially breastfeeding women. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What’s the difference between this and a prenatal?

Our Total Postnatal is specially formulated to support a mother’s nutritional needs after childbirth, with breastfeeding support in mind.

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Postpartum Reset is designed to support a woman's hormonal balance throughout the postpartum phase with Vitamin D, B-Complex vitamins, Flaxseed, DHA, Ashwagandha, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

My baby is a year old, but my hormones still seem out of whack. Will this benefit me? 

We do believe the herbs and vitamins in our Postpartum Reset will be beneficial for you! Some women can experience hormonal imbalance for some time after childbirth and we are here to support you. However, we do suggest you check with your doctor before beginning any new supplementation as they can advise you best!

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer: Pink Stork Recovery Tea features Oatstraw, Dandelion Leaf, Red Raspberry Leaf, and more USDA Organic herbs to supply nutrients after childbirth and support healthy postpartum recovery!  Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer: Pink Stork Uplift Tea features Chamomile, Lemon Verbena, Nettle, Lavender, and more USDA Organic herbs to help support healthy moods after childbirth. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer: Pink Stork Recovery Bundle includes two leading postpartum teas: Recovery (Strawberry Passion Fruit) and Slim (Sweet Hibiscus), plus a comprehensive Total Postnatal (with DHA, B-vitamins, Folate, and more essential nutrients). These are beneficial for breastfeeding moms, too! These products support your body before and after childbirth. For use after childbirth. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Slim Tea is designed to support natural digestion and energy levels with herbs including Rooibos, Green Tea Leaves, Turmeric, Cinnamon, and more USDA Organic herbs! Incorporate with a healthy diet and exercise plan for the best results. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Is Pink Stork Slim proven for weight loss?

Pink Stork Slim contains herbs to naturally support energy and digestion - which can lead to weight loss when used with a healthy diet and exercise.

settings.title: Postpartum
settings.answer: Our Postpartum Reset, Uplift Tea (Refreshing Lime), and Recovery Tea (Strawberry Passion Fruit) provide support for new moms throughout the fourth trimester. These are for use after childbirth. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

settings.title: Menopause
settings.answer:
The herbs in Pink Stork Menopause support the relief of a variety of symptoms and promote overall wellness during this season of life. Pink Stork Menopause is designed for women before, during, and after menopause with Chun Mee, Black Cohosh, Chaste Tree Berries, Fenugreek, Dong Quai, and more. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I take this before menopause?

Yes! This is designed for women to use before, during, and after menopause.

settings.title: Gut Health
settings.answer:
Gut Health supports your body’s natural immune system and supports healthy gut bacteria. Gut Health is monolaurin, which is a by-product of coconut fat, also found in breast milk - nature’s most amazing immune booster. It’s not a capsule or powder, they are small pellets with a scoop for measuring. Just place in your mouth, and swallow with water. Do not chew. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

What is Gut Health?

Our Gut Health is made of monolaurin, which supports your body’s natural immune system, and general digestive wellness.

Why is my nausea/sickness getting worse?

As your body works to eradicate the bad bacteria in your system, it can lead to nausea. This is known as the Herxheimer Reaction, which can last 1-2 weeks. Drinking extra water can also help flush out the dead bacteria, and will help keep your body hydrated. Many women experience relief after this initial phase. You may want to decrease your dosage during this time. If you have any concerns, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How many teaspoons are in 1 scoop?

¼ teaspoon per scoop.

settings.title: Gut Health
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Pro is our probiotic for pregnant women. Pro is used to support gut health, and support relief from constipation, diarrhea, indigestion, heartburn, yeast, and much more. Pro provides healthy bacteria to your gut for whole-body benefits! Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

When should I consume the Pro?

We typically recommend consuming our Pro before breakfast each morning. If you are struggling to keep them down without food, we recommend consuming them alongside crackers or something not too acidic.

Can I take 4 Pro per day to speed up the process?

We do not typically recommend taking 4 Pro a day, as it could cause gastrointestinal issues and will not speed up the process of killing the bad bacteria. Pro does not provide immediate relief, as it works to support your overall gut health and immune system.

Do I need to take a prenatal vitamin with my Pro?

We do recommend taking a prenatal vitamin to ensure you are receiving all the vitamins you need. We offer three prenatal vitamins (Liquid Prenatal, Total Prenatal, Premium Prenatal)!

settings.title: Gut Health
settings.child-title: Pink Stork Morning Sickness Tea Ginger Orange
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Morning Sickness Tea supports nausea and digestive relief and also helps you stay hydrated. Chunks of Ginger and Red Rooibos tea provide soothing relief to upset stomachs. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How much Ginger is in each sachet?

The average sachet has around 500 mg of Ginger.

settings.answer:

How much Ginger is in each sachet?

The average sachet has around 500 mg of Ginger.

These individually wrapped drops are discreet and easy to use as on-the-go relief! Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

15 mg.

settings.answer:

settings.answer:
Pink Stork Calm Tea is designed to support general relaxation with USDA Organic Lavender, Lemon Balm, Rosehips, and other herbs. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation! 

Can I drink this during my first trimester?

We’ve found that our Calm Tea is typically great for all stages of pregnancy. We do recommend checking with your doctor before beginning any supplementation as they can advise you best!

settings.title: General Wellness
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Flakes contain high amounts of Magnesium, which is easily absorbed through the skin! Low magnesium levels are often associated with nausea, irritability, low energy levels, restlessness, and other discomforts. Add them in a bath or foot soak before bed. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

How are these harvested?

Our Flakes are harvested using natural solar energy that evaporates the water from the Dead Sea and leaves behind the Flakes.

settings.title: General Wellness
settings.answer:
Mist is a quick and convenient Magnesium body spray. Low magnesium levels are often associated with feelings of nausea, stress, irritability, aches, pains, sleeplessness, and so much more. Just spray a few pumps on your wrists, arms, feet, or any area of exposed skin and let dry; magnesium is absorbed through your skin and goes directly to your bloodstream. Mist is made from premium Dead Sea Salt and purified water. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Is there a limit to how much I can use Mist?

Many women will use our Mist many times throughout the day without issue. If you start to have a rash, cut down on the usage. We recommend spraying it on your feet, first—that's where your pores are the largest, so it absorbs into your bloodstream more easily.

How much magnesium is in each spray?

There is 200 mg of Magnesium per 6 sprays of our Mist, so each spray is roughly 33.3 mg.

settings.title: General Wellness
settings.answer:
Pink Stork Sleep is designed to support relaxation and restful sleep with USDA Organic Lavender, Lemon Balm, Oat Straw, Coconut, Spearmint, and Anise. Before starting any new form of supplementation, we strongly recommend checking in with your doctor or healthcare professional as they can advise you on your personal situation!

Can I use this while pregnant?

Many of our customers use Sleep while pregnant.

settings.title: Product Samples
settings.answer: We currently offer a limited selection of teas and sweets that are available in sample sizes that you can taste before buying. Please reach out to our customer service team at cs@pinkstork.com or through the Contact Us form, and we can give you more information!

settings.content:
Amy Suzanne created Pink Stork from her own health struggles. When her husband was deployed and she was caring for their young, growing family, she was diagnosed with severe hyperemesis gravidarum, which she suffered from throughout her pregnancies. Amy knew there had to be a purpose behind the suffering and believed God wouldn’t put these challenges in her life without reason—she had to trust in Him and His plan.

Pink Stork was born from a desire to find and create products that would change not only Amy's life, but the lives of other women.

WHAT AMY SUZANNE LIVES BY: 

And not only that, but we also boast in our sufferings, knowing that suffering produces endurance, and endurance produces character, and character produces hope, and hope does not disappoint us. Romans 5:3-5

settings.text:
From Amy Suzanne: "Pink Stork was born from my three life-changing pregnancies over the course of four years. My pregnancies were debilitating, and I was diagnosed with hyperemesis gravidarum (which is often described as “morning sickness on steroids”). My husband, Thomas, was working extensively with the Marine Corps and was deployed twice during my pregnancies, plus we moved 11 times! Each of these struggles led to the creation of Pink Stork. 

In 2009, my husband and I found out that we were going to become parents. What should have been an exciting time turned out to be the biggest challenge of our lives. I started experiencing severe morning sickness, vomiting 20-30 times per day, unable to eat or function, and suffered from severe weight loss and dehydration. Six weeks into my pregnancy, I was finally diagnosed with HG. While I was happy to have a diagnosis, there weren’t any real solutions.

I was hospitalized several times, and one doctor even gave me and my unborn baby just 24 hours to live. Thankfully, I ended up delivering my son (we are both happy and healthy today) and everything was back to normal! Until my second pregnancy. My second experience was just like the first, except now I had a toddler to care for. Doctors continually offered band-aid treatments for my sickness, but they never got to the root of the problem. My third pregnancy was a repeat of the previous pregnancies.

I knew something had to change. I was committed to finding a way to help alleviate the root cause of my health struggles. I implemented a new health protocol as soon as I found out I was expecting my fourth child—vitamins and supplements from around the world, combined with diet changes, helped eliminate nausea and vomiting while nourishing my body. My health flourished, my son thrived, and after a full 40-week pregnancy, I delivered a healthy, nine-pound baby boy! I started Pink Stork shortly after his birth, and, while we started with pregnancy and morning sickness products, that was truly just the beginning. I experienced another “normal,” healthy pregnancy with my fifth child, who was born in March of 2018!

I realized the power of natural and organic healing and felt led to empower other women on their health journeys. I know that God has blessed me immensely through my struggles and personal experiences, which all led me to start Pink Stork. Our brand has grown immensely, adding products to support women through all stages of life, and our team has grown, too! We are proud to be the brand that women can trust and believe in."
